alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 6:46PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN BEAUREGARD AND NORTHWESTERN CALCASIEU PARISHES...SOUTHERN NEWTON...EAST CENTRAL HARDIN AND SOUTHEASTERN JASPER COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM CST... At 645 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Roganville to near Old Salem to Weiss Bluff. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, De Ridder, Newton, Kirbyville, Merryville, Singer, Deweyville, Evadale, De Quincy, Call, Starks, Fields, Bon Weir, Buna, Weiss Bluff, Gist, Trout Creek, Lunita, Bivens, and Hartburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
